messages.subject: Ren!!
messages.msgSnippet: I really couldn t figure out the saw in the front of the picture...what WAS it doing there?  It was the interest they decided to hone in on for Sierra.
messages.messageBody:
" I really couldn't figure out the saw in the
front of the picture...what WAS it doing there? "

It was the interest they decided to hone in on for Sierra. They asked
each of my kids to pick one of their favorite activities to be
represented in the pic. It felt very unnatural posing like that of
course, but that's their call.

He actually had her using the saw for several pics, it was SO loud. I
kept saying "she could just act like she's using it!" but I think he
really was fascinated with a 9y.o. girl that could handle a compound
miter saw like a pro.

After he got sawdust on his camera lense, he decided to stop asking
her to cut with the thing!! I was thinking "I told you so.....";)

The background is actually not our property. We're standing in our
yard with a vacant lot behind us. Our backyard was actually much
prettier imo! Maybe they wanted a wilder look....I dunno.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
